summary: This test module defines a suite of unit tests for functions that convert various S3 configuration objects (ACLs, lifecycle rules, notifications, public access block settings) into dictionary representations and for listing discovered S3 resources. The tests are currently isolated and not exercised by the broader codebase.
business_intent: Validate that S3 configuration data structures can be accurately serialized to JSON-compatible dictionaries and that resource discovery mechanisms produce correct listings, supporting configuration management and compliance checks.
